markdown:
| icon              = poe2 leather_armor_garari_cuirass icon.png
| description       = Though now extinct, the giant lizards known as garari once roamed the many islands of the Deadfire. They were fast, powerful, and cunning predators, hated amongst kith for their tendency to kill domestic goats and pigs if given half a chance. When foreign colonists arrived in the archipelago, many local governors placed an open bounty on any garari, and the creatures where soon hunted to oblivion. Now rare due to a lack of available material, hardened garari leather armor such as this is quite desirable, as it is tough and naturally flexible.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Armor
| armor_type        = Leather armor
| armor_category    = Light armor
| requirements      = 
| is_soulbound      = no
| is_unique         = yes

| dr_shock          =

| rel_items         =

| internalname      = Leather_Armor_U_Garari_Cuirass
| location          = * [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/).
| guid              = 1cb83310-bb3d-4036-985f-b6b5f7b5bfc7
}}
